sources.title: El Hijo Pródigo ( 1969)
sources.description: Plot: A lawyer convinces his client to cheat on a famous singer with great wealth, thus eliminating him and collecting the insurance. What nobody expects is that the farce is uncovered sooner than they thought.

metadata.Plot: A lawyer convinces his client to cheat on a famous singer with great wealth, thus eliminating him and collecting the insurance. What nobody expects is that the farce is uncovered sooner than they thought.
metadata.Writer: Julio Alejandro, José María Fernández Unsáin, Luis Llorente
metadata.Actors: Libertad Lamarque, Carlos Lico, Julián Bravo
